```{r}
library(tidyverse)

matches_2000s <- read_csv("data/wta_matches_2000s.csv")
```

```{r}
wimbledon <- matches_2000s |>
filter(tourney_name == "Wimbledon") |>
mutate(winner_seed = as.numeric(winner_seed))
```

```{r}
wimbledon |>
ggplot(aes(x = winner_seed)) +
geom_histogram()
```
